testcase.summary: Do robustness test round for Photovault.
testcase.description:
Open Photovault database with enough images. Use it for about 30 minutes. Do at least following operations:
* Open at least 100 images for viewing, including several big images
* View images with "fit to window" and different zoom levels
* Open some images in different window
* Crop images
* Adjust resolution of some images
* Import a directory
* Update volumes, browse files at same time
testcase.expectedresult: All operations work with sufficient performance, no unexpected errors.
